content:
The creative concept is as follows:
Create impactful content showcasing the Gucci Guilty fragrance collection and its iconic flacons to convey the concept of #ForeverGuilty through the celebration of magnetism and self-love by “coming out of the shadows” or “stepping into the sun/light”, “being proud of who you are”, …
Shooted in unexpected locations, for example in a vintage store, laundry room or a cool underground spot..

Key elements:
Product integration and visibility mandatory
At least one product still life deliverable
Positive message and energy
Communication (in content & copy) of magnetism and self love
